mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_amount, status, shipping_address) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{shippingAddress})
INSERT INTO order_items (order_id, product_id, quantity, price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, oi.id as item_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity as item_quantity, oi.price as item_price, p.name as product_name, p.image_url as product_image FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE o.id = #{id}

SELECT o.*, oi.id as item_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity as item_quantity, oi.price as item_price, p.name as product_name, p.image_url as product_image FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
